maqras.text: 51|31|geuga sajadeul-iyeo dangsindeul ui yongmuneun mueos-ibnikka mul-euni
51|32|geudeul-i malhagil ulineun joeag e ppajin baegseong-ege bonaeeojyeo
51|33|geudeul wie chalheulg-ui dol-eul bisbalcheoleom bonaeni
51|34|geugeos-eun joejieun jadeul-ege ju nim-ui pyosiga jjeoghyeo bonaejin geos-ila hadeola
51|35|geuttae hananim-eun geugos-e iss-eossdeon mid-eum-eul gajin sindodeul-eul guhanola
51|36|geuleona hananim-eun han gajeong oeeneun eotteon museullimdo balgyeonchi moshayeo
51|37|museoun jingbeol-eul dulyeowo haneun geudeul-eul wihae geugos-e yejeung-eul namgyeo dueossnola
51|38|mose-ui iyagi sog-edo yejeung i issnani bola hananim-eun geuege myeongbaeghan gwonneung-eul jueo palao-ege bonaessnola
51|39|geuleona geuneun geuui gundaewa deobul-eo oemyeonhamyeo geuneun masulsainga animyeon michin jainga lago malhayeoss deola
51|40|geulihayeo hananim-eun geuwa geu ligo geuui gundaeleul pohoeghayeo bada sog-e deonjyeoss-eumae geue daehan binan-eun dang-yeonhaessdeola
51|41|adeuui baegseong sog-eseodo yejeung i issnani bola hananim-i geudeul-e ge pamyeol-ui balam-eul bonaess-euni
51|42|balam-i bul-eossdeon gos-eneun amugeosdo namgyeojin geos-eobs-i jaecheoleom pagoe doeeo beolyeossdeola
51|43|samudeu baegseong sog-eseodo yejeung i iss-eoss-euni bola jamsidong-an hyanglag hagoja hayeoss-eudoe
51|44|geudeul-eun junim-ui myeonglyeong-eul geoyeog hayeoss-eumae jikyeobodeon jingbeol-ui gwang-eum-igeudeul-eul myeolmangke hayeossdeola
51|45|geudeul-eun il-eoseol sudo eobs-eossgo seuseuloleul bohohal sudo eobs-eossnola
51|46|geudeul ijeon-ui noaui baegseongdo geulaess-euni geudeuldo saaghan baegseongdeul-ieossnola
51|47|hananimkkeseo haneul-eul dusa gwon neung-gwa neunglyeog-eulo nop-i dugo neolbge dusyeoss-eumyeo
51|48|daejileul dudoe neolbge pyeolchyeoss-euneo eolmana aleumdabge pyeolchyeo jyeossneunyo
51|49|hananim-i modeun geos-eul changjoha sidoe jaung-eul dueoss-euni ilo hayeo neohuiga gyohun-eul eoddolog ham-ila
51|50|geuleomeulo seodulleo hananimkkeloola sillo naneun geubunkkeseo neohuie ge bonaen bunmyeonghan seonjijala
51|51|hananimgwa deobul-eo daleun geos-eul sungbaehaji malla sillo naega geubun-eu lobuteo neohuiege on bunmyeonghan seonji jala
51|52|geudeul ijeon-edo seonjijaga baegseongdeul-ege wass-eudoe geudeul ttohan geuneun ma sulsayo animyeon michinjala malhaessdeola
51|53|geudeul-i seolo-ege sangsoghan yu san-ilado doendan mal-inga sillo geudeul eun omanhan baegseongdeul-ila
51|54|geuleomeulo geudeul-eul meollihala geulihamyeon munchaegbadji anh-eul geos-ila
51|55|geuleona geudaeui mesejileul galeuchila midneun sindodeul-ege yuighanila
51|56|naega yeongmawa ingan-eul changjoham-eungeudeul-i naleul seomgige halyeo ham-ila
51|57|naega geudeul-ege il-yonghal yangsig eul guhaji anihamyeo ttohan naleul bu yanghagil balajido anhnola
51|58|sillo hananim-eun gwonneung-gwa him-ui junim-euloseo il-yonghal yangsig-eul bepuneun suyeojaisila
51|59|joejieun mulineun geudeul donglyoui muliwa yusahan beol-eul badnola geuleo meulo na-ege seodulleo guhaji anhdo log hala
51|60|geudeul-i yagsogbad-eun geunal-eul midji anihan jadeul-ege jaeang-i iss-eulila
52|1|ttuleu san-eulo maengsehasa
52|2|gilogdoen seongseolo maengsehamyeo
52|3|geugeos-eun pyeolchyeojin yangpijie gilog doen geos-ila
52|4|gyeongbaehagi wihae bangmun-i jaj-eun ka-euba sinjeon-eulo maengsehamyeo
52|5|nop-eun haneullo maengsehamyeo
52|6|manjoga doen badalo maengsehanani
52|7|geudae junim-ui beol-eun bandeusi nae lil geos-ila
52|8|eoneu nugudo geugeos-eul pihal su eobsnola
52|9|haneul-i jindonghaneun nal
52|10|geuligo sandeul-i hwinallineun nal
52|11|geunal-eul geoyeoghan jadeul-ege jae ang-i iss-eul geos-ila
52|12|geudeul-eun heowie molduhan jadeullo
52|13|geunal-e solichimyeo buljieug-eulo kkeullyeogani
52|14|igeos-i balo neohuiga geoyeoghaess deon buljiog-ila malhayeo jideola
52|15|igeosdo masul-inyo animyeon neo huiga bojileul moshaneunyo
52|16|geugos-eulo deul-eoga masbola neohuiga geugeos-eul innaehadeon ttoneun innae haji moshadeon geugeos-eun neohui haeng-wie daehan bosang-ila
52|17|geuleona uiloun jadeul-eun eunhye ui cheongug-eulo deul-eoga
52|18|junimkkeseo geudeul-ege bepul chug bog-eul mankkighago ttohan geudeul-ui junim eun buljiog-ui eungbeollobuteo geudeul-eul bohohayeo jusinola
52|19|yuighago jeulgeoi meoggo masi la neohuiui haeng-wie daehan gyeolgwalaneun malsseum-i iss-eulila
52|20|geudeul-i chimsang-e juljieo gidae ni hananim-eun geudeul-ege nun-i keun aleumdaun baeujaleul anjge hasideola

52|21|mid-eum-eul gajin jawa geudeul-eul ttala mid-eum-eul gajin husondeul-i issnani hananim-eun husondeul-eul geudeulgwa hamkke gyeolhabsikyeo julila ttohan hananim-eun geudeul-i haenghan geosdeul-eul gamhaji anh-eul geos-ila modeun ingan-eun geuga haenghan geos-e daehan chaeg-im-i issnola
52|22|hananim-eun geudeul-i wonhaneun gwa silgwa yuglyuleul buyeohani
52|23|geudeul-eun seologa seolo-ege hae ag-i eobsneun jan-eul jugo bad-eul ttae
